6179a3d7-b017-4dd6-8070-57b88375b8ba.description: Proactive Leadership is an annual series of 11 management-level courses designed for current and future credit union leaders. Participants are nominated to participate in the program. Selected individuals must have demonstrated effective leadership ability as well as a solid understanding of our company's core values and mission. Courses include technical, professional, credit union specific, and soft skill courses. Our program graduates will earn the Proactive Leadership Certification.
6179a3d7-b017-4dd6-8070-57b88375b8ba.name: Proactive Leadership Certification Program

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: Proactive Beginnings - Proactive Leadership is an annual series of 11 management-level courses designed for current and future credit union leaders. Participants are nominated to participate in the program. Selected individuals must have demonstrated effective leadership ability as well as a solid understanding of our company's core values and mission. Courses include technical, professional, credit union specific, and soft skill courses.

81194986-81d0-47ed-8032-07838f4f1e7a.description: Compass Training is a three day training course that covers technical aspects, products and services, policies and procedures and culture and core values of ONCU. It includes an intro to all of the systems branches use, as well as hands on time in the lab for all major systems used in the branches.
81194986-81d0-47ed-8032-07838f4f1e7a.name: Retail Operations Compass Program

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: Employee attended all three days of Compass Training.

skills.name: Understanding ONCU Culture And Core Values

f6b8d602-fc56-4ee2-9e8b-70ff7c3837a9.description: MAP (Mentor Assistance Program) Coaches are employees who have demonstrated the ability and willingness to develop others. MAP Coaches are nominated by their branch managers and District AVPs and approved by the Training Department. MAP Coaches are partnered with a new employee for a three week period and instruct according to an established training checklist ensuring a new employee is trained thoroughly on products, services and superior member service.
f6b8d602-fc56-4ee2-9e8b-70ff7c3837a9.name: Retail Operations MAP Coach Certification

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: MAP Coaches must complete a three part assessment: Basic Skills Test, Customer Service Aptitude Profile and Computer Literacy and Internet Knowledge Test. Items evaluated include basic grammar and learning ability, personality traits and proficiency using Internet browsers and desktop applications.
MAP Coaches attend certification training that covers different styles of adults learning and the importance of building rapport with the trainee.

b108628b-744a-4768-b43f-b4bdf40bbb7c.description: Success Sells is a two day product knowledge and sales technique seminar specifically designed for branch employees to lay the foundation of a more sales conscious mindset. Key selling points and phrases are discussed and representatives from our ancillary departments (Insurance and Investments) provide in-depth information on products they offer and how to review member accounts for opportunities to sell.
b108628b-744a-4768-b43f-b4bdf40bbb7c.name: Success Sells Program Retail Operations

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: Employee successfully participated in two days of Success Sells.

b909a9f5-25f6-4ec0-afd8-fb7a602e4bf5.description: The Mindful Leadership Certification (IOM-ML) is designed for high-potentials and leaders at every level of our organization. It is a comprehensive introduction to the science and practice of mindfulness, applied to develop the most important mental and emotional skills for effective leadership. This course is for individuals seeking to become more effective managers and leaders.
b909a9f5-25f6-4ec0-afd8-fb7a602e4bf5.name: Mindful Leadership Certification (IOM-ML)

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: In order to earn the IOM Mindful Leadership Certification (IOM-ML): Participants must take a pre-and-post course assessment. Participate in a live 90-minute master class. Complete 8 weekly self-study lessons. Pass 8 weekly progress exams and complete an 8 week series of daily video practices. Pass a comprehensive final exam. Additionally, participants can participate in 8 optional coaching sessions through this program.

Week 1: Introduction to Mindfulness This class is a comprehensive introduction to the nature, hands-on practice, outcomes and application of science-based mindfulness. You will learn: The neuroscience, biology and psychology of mindfulness. The essential practices of mindfulness: Present Awareness, Breath Control, Breath Meditation, Visualization and Insight Meditation - and how to apply them to optimize physical, mental and emotional states and the foundational attitudes of mindfulness.

Week 2: Leadership Stress and Burnout. Leaders cite work as the primary source of stress in their lives and believe that having a leadership role increases that stress. You will learn: To recognize and reduce the stressors and triggers most common to managers and leaders. To reframe and reduce self-criticism, negative rumination, anxiety and worry. Lean and develop Mindfulness practices that reduce chronic stress and increase mental and emotional strength.

Week 3: Leadership Focus and Attention Control. Focus, attention control and sustained concentration are critical leadership skills. This class explores the challenges of distraction and attention deficit and neural strategies for dampening inbound signals while strengthening attention control. You will learn: To reinforce brain circuits for directing and sustaining attention. To intentionally control what to diffuse, pay attention to, and learn how to strengthen awareness and focus attention.

Week 4: Leading Through Change and Uncertainty. This class explores ways mindfulness can help us navigate through volatility, uncertainty, complexity and ambiguity and lead others effectively through change. You will learn: How the brain struggles to adapt in an unpredictable and increasingly complex environment. To de-center and regard changing circumstances with objectivity and equanimity. Mindfulness practices that help us accept, adapt, and embrace change with an open and curious mind.

Week 5: Leading With Trust and Influence. Effective leaders inspire, motivate and mobilize others. This class shows how mindfulness impacts the mix of mental, emotional and interpersonal skills that comprise these capabilities. You will learn: The fundamentals of self-knowledge, authenticity and personal presence. To identify and act on your intentional beliefs, values and behaviors, practices that develop traits that inspire trust, confidence and loyalty.

Week 6: Leading With Social and Emotional Intelligence. Social and emotional intelligence are central to effective leadership. This class shows how mindfulness strengthens the foundational traits of self awareness, self-regulation, empathy and compassion, effective communication, and social grace. You will learn: The most current framework and competencies that comprise social and emotional intelligence. and practices that cultivate self-awareness, self-control, kindness and compassion.

Week 7 - Leadership Communication Effective leaders are able to listen closely and respond with clarity while under great pressure. This class shows how mindfulness can be applied to train attention, and create the mental space to choose our most strategic response You will learn: To direct undivided attention. To create connection, attunement, and rapport. Mindfulness practices that strengthen effective communication skills.

Week 8 - Leadership Grit and Resilience Leaders must be able to sustain energy under pressure, cope with disruptive changes, and adapt quickly. This class shows how mindfulness neural training creates the mental toughness, grit and resilience that drive peak performance. You will learn: To train the brain to face fear, take action and persevere. To train mental strength and emotional stability. Mindfulness practices that help us to withstand, adapt, and recover from challenging circumstances.

0aebe551-4a24-498d-8e26-9a0771647365.description: The Mindful Wellbeing and Performance Certification (IOM-MW) helps individuals and teams navigate the new normal of volatile change, complexity and uncertainty. It is a comprehensive introduction to the nature, science and essential mindfulness practices that relieve chronic stress and anxiety - reduce the impact of information overload, digital distraction, unconscious bias, conflict, exhaustion and burnout - and give us the mental space and emotional strength to thrive.
0aebe551-4a24-498d-8e26-9a0771647365.name: Mindful Wellbeing Certification: IOM-MW

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: In order to earn the IOM Mindful Wellbeing Certification (IOM-MW): Participants must take a pre-and-post course assessment. Participate in a live 90-minute master class. Complete 8 weekly self-study lessons. Pass 8 weekly progress exams and complete an 8-week series of daily video practices. Pass a comprehensive final exam. Additionally, participants can participate in 8 optional coaching sessions through this program.

Week 1: Introduction to Mindfulness Three decades of research have confirmed that the mind can physically change the brain and body - and mindfulness proves it. This class provides an overview of the nature, science, hands-on practice, and application of modern mindfulness. You will learn: The psychology and neuroscience of mindfulness How mindfulness strengthens our brains and bodies The foundational formal and informal mindfulness practices

Week 2 - Reducing Stress and Anxiety. This class explores strategies and practices that relieve workplace pressures, stress-related burnout, and chronic illness. You will learn: The evolutionary wiring and triggers that creates negativity, chronic stress and mental exhaustion. How mindfulness is applied to reframe worry, self-critical and depressive thinking. Apply practices that reduce stress, increases mental and emotional resilience

Week 3 - Reducing Distraction and Attention Deficit. This class explores practices that physically strengthen brain networks associated with focus, concentration and attention control. You will learn: The sources and science of information overload, digital distraction and workplace ADD How to apply mindfulness to suppress distraction, and increase attention control Mindfulness practices that strengthen our abilities to direct and sustain concentration

Week 4 - Adapting to Change and Uncertainty. Our brains are wired to fear change and loathe uncertainty, yet we live in a world and workplace that is undergoing volatile and rapid disruption. This class explores mindfulness as a positive catalyst for change management. You will learn: How change and uncertainty triggers fear that hijacks our emotional state. How mindfulness helps us consciously navigate from the known to an uncertain future state and develop the mental skill to embrace change.

Week 5 - A Positive and Growth Mindset. Motivation, engagement and performance flow from a positive mindset. But our brain needs help recognizing and overcoming pain, fear and worry. This class explores practices that interrupt our negative bias and reactivity and strengthen circuits for positivity, expanded learning, and growth. You will learn: How brains get started and stuck in cycles of negativity and how mindfulness is applied to reframe, change behaviors, reconcile, and move forward.

Week 6 - Developing Social and Emotional Intelligence. This class examines the visceral power of social and emotional intelligence, and how to strengthen these foundational inter-personal capabilities. You will learn: The framework and competencies that comprise social and emotional intelligence How to use mindfulness to strengthen self-and-social-awareness, empathy and communication Mindfulness practices for care, kindness and compassionate behaviors.

Week 7 - Communication and Collaboration. Mindfulness enables us to listen deeply and consciously, to pay close attention to aural tone, non-verbal cues and body language to connect with our intuition and to create rapport. This class introduces strategies and practices for strengthening awareness, attention control, and effective interpersonal communication skills. You will learn: To connect cooperatively with others, articulate productive dialogue, increase intuition, attunement and rapport.

Week 8 - Mental Strength, Grit and Resilience. Mindfulness dampens the negativity that saps our energy, reduces our stress, anxiety and worry - and gives us the mental strength to cope with difficult situations, and bounce back from adversity. This class explores practices that build our emotional stability and resilience You will learn: The principles of elite performance How mindfulness connects us to the state of flow Mindfulness practices for mental toughness, grit and resilience

skills.name: Cultivate Empathy And Care For Others

f7961069-18b4-4564-9d3b-55c6e9b184d0.description: ONCUniversity instills the countless advantages of diversity in the workplace by implementing our ECHO Diversity viewpoint. ECHO, which stands for Every Contact Has Opportunity, explores the positive side of the differences we recognize in each other. Teaching ECHO, employees appreciate the differences in society and sincerely understand that we can all learn from a diverse workforce. ONCU defines “diversity respect” as the due regard for the feelings, wishes, rights, or traditions of others.
f7961069-18b4-4564-9d3b-55c6e9b184d0.name: Diversity Equity and Inclusion Champion

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners must complete a classroom session that outlines the differences between diversity, inclusion, equality, and equity. Attendees will learn the dangers of micro-inequities, the advantages of a diverse and inclusive workplace, and how to deal with personal biases. Badge earners will also learn diversity’s “blind audition philosophy” and how to mentally prepare to use this when interacting with people, thus becoming a Diversity Champion.

skills.name: Apply Concepts Of Diversity And Inclusion

4a7f306f-1bbd-45fe-998c-74c606e76d82.description: The Mindful Sales and Service Certification (IOM-MS&S): proves the mental and emotional skills that top sales and service professionals apply to close more sales, and create delighted, loyal customers. This course is designed for individuals and teams alike. It teaches the brain management and mental skills that help sales and service professionals bring their best game every day, and perform in a state of high-energy flow.
4a7f306f-1bbd-45fe-998c-74c606e76d82.name: Mindful Sales and Service Certification: IOM-MS&S

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: In order to earn the The Mindful Sales and Service Certification (IOM-MS&S): Participants must take a pre-and-post course assessment. Participate in a live 90-minute master class. Complete 8 weekly self-study lessons. Pass 8 weekly progress exams and complete an 8-week series of daily video practices. Pass a comprehensive final exam. Additionally, participants can participate in 8 optional coaching sessions through this program.

Week 1: Introduction to Mindfulness This class is a comprehensive introduction to the nature, hands-on practice, outcomes and application of science-based mindfulness. You will learn: The neuroscience, biology and psychology of mindfulness. The essential practices of mindfulness: Present Awareness, Breath Control, Breath Meditation, Visualization and Insight Meditation - and how to apply them to optimize physical, mental and emotional states and the foundational attitudes of mindfulness.

Week 2 - Stress and Anxiety. Effective sales and service require high-performing mental and emotional skills. This class explores mindfulness strategies for reducing our negativity, anxiety and worries and introduces practices that restore our awareness, energy and motivation. You will learn: To recognize the onset of negative states, the most effective ways to intercept and diminish them, apply mindfulness to shift perspective, reduce stress, illness, and increase mental and emotional strength.

Week 3 - Focus and Attention Control. Sales and customer service call for laser-sharp focus, yet it's getting harder to simply stay on task. This class explores practices to strengthen the brain networks associated with focus, attention control and concentration. You will learn: The sources and science of information overload, digital distraction and attention deficit How mindfulness is applied to suppress distraction, increase focus and strengthen our abilities to direct and sustain attention.

Week 4 - Change and Uncertainty. How can we overcome our own discomfort, while helping our prospects and clients focus, listen and buy? This class explores strategies for creating calm and exerting influence amid volatile change and uncertainty. You will learn: How change triggers fear circuits in the brain that hijack our emotional state - how to disarm them and help us navigate successfully from the familiar, to an uncertain future state and help us accept the inevitability of uncertainty.

Week 5 - Trust and Influence. Effective sales and service professionals create trust and confidence through observable acts of integrity, fairness, good judgment and unselfish behaviors. This class explores practices that strengthen behavioral traits that encourage trust. You will learn: Fundamentals of self awareness and authenticity Applying mindfulness to strengthen personal ethics, integrity and trustworthiness and practices to develop the traits that inspire trust, confidence and loyalty.

Week 6 - Relationship Management. This class examines the visceral power of social and emotional intelligence, and how to strengthen these foundational interpersonal capabilities. You will learn: The framework and competencies that comprise social and emotional intelligence How to use mindfulness to strengthen self-and-social-awareness, empathy and communication Mindfulness practices for care, kindness and compassionate behaviors.

Week 7 - Negotiation and Persuasion. This class introduces strategies and practices for strengthening attunement, mirroring, pacing and other important negotiation and persuasion methods. You will learn: How to connect closely and cooperatively with others How to conduct an articulate and productive dialogue Mindfulness practices that increase intuition, rapport and influence with prospects and clients.

Week 8 - Mental Toughness, Grit and Resilience. Sales and service roles are high-pressure roles, and can be frustrating, discouraging and exhausting. This class explores practices that build our emotional stability and resilience. You will learn: The principles of energy management How mindfulness connects us to stress and the state of flow Mindfulness practices for mental toughness, grit and resilience.

876dac05-7b93-45e3-b7fb-608a8a97ab2b.name: One Nevada Credit Union Culture Badge

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: ddddddddd

fcdd3a18-b471-43c3-a8a1-93da082f1683.description: SUCCESS Class is a three-day classroom session that can best be described as a service culture experience. Within the three days of SUCCESS, employees will immerse themselves into what it truly means to provide Memorable Member Service. The motto for the class is “SUCCESS is not owned, SUCCESS is rented; and payment comes due every day.” This slogan sets the tone for the week - that complacency and stagnation is the leading cause of member attrition and the feeling of indifference.
fcdd3a18-b471-43c3-a8a1-93da082f1683.name: Success Program Retail Operations

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: SUCCESS Class educates badge earners on numerous member service topics and how to truly become a Service Champion. Immersed topics include: Becoming Service Prophets, Understanding Upset Members, Listening, Service Mapping, Teamwork, How to Have a Bad Day, Member Expectations, Sales Culture, and Bringing Mission Statements to Life. SUCCESS is a certificate-driven class that concludes in a graduation ceremony.

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: dddddddddd

6e8a5025-095d-4959-8227-7d5e5af463a9.description: Mobile troubleshooting teaches employees about the technology-related issues that people have with the different types of mobile phones on the market today. Badge earners will learn how to confidentially help and serve people regardless of what operating system, phone manufacturer, or model of device they are using. This “One Stop Shop” training tutorial is designed to educate our staff with step-by-step instructions and visual aids that are accurate and easy to follow.
6e8a5025-095d-4959-8227-7d5e5af463a9.name: Mobile Technology Trouble Shooter

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners will learn how to utilize an online knowledge base that will help them serve members relating to the specifics of both Apple and Android operating systems, Zoom & Display settings, Errors on the login page, MFA codes errors, Password resets, and Error codes. In addition, attendees will learn the four categories of reported phone issues and how to quickly recognize and solve the problem. The class covers cell phones, tablets, laptops, and desktop computers.

6ee7514e-2298-4ba3-8cd6-844d8b4839b0.description: ONCU transforms the “been there, done that” feeling when it comes to annual compliance training. One Nevada takes pride in the fact that compliance regulators have always graded us high when it comes to meeting compliance standards. However, the program goal is to not simply comply, but to teach, talk about and retain the information as it pertains to the banking industry.
6ee7514e-2298-4ba3-8cd6-844d8b4839b0.name: One Nevada Credit Union Annual Regulatory Compliance

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners are assigned compliance courses in our LMS. These courses are self-paced and can be taken within the first three quarters of the year. Certificates are issued after successful completion. Then, in the fourth quarter, attendance in a BSA Class is mandatory as ONCU conducts annual “roadshows” to review, discuss and share vital points of the training. ONCU annual compliance training consists of: BSA, OFAC, USA PATRIOT Act, Elder Abuse Awareness, and Consumer Privacy.

e8fce9b2-60f4-4667-8707-90a5b0eff81e.description: Badge earners will be educated in outbound sales calls without sounding like a salesperson in an effort to gain a more confident and self-assured mindset before, during, and after sales calls. The purpose of the class is to help participants internally take ownership of outbound telephone sales calls and focus on offering solutions instead of products.
e8fce9b2-60f4-4667-8707-90a5b0eff81e.name: One Nevada Credit Union Member Outreach Program

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisite courses – ICMI: Using your Voice Series; Your Voice Matters & Speaking Clearly. *course does include a post-class test. Classroom session – three-hour in-person training. Agenda: Set a proper mindset. (presentation) How to extract information to create a member profile. (Episys) Warm call techniques (presentation & handouts) Call guide rehearsals. (Live Member, Voicemail)

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: fffffffffff

12d11382-7f88-4e79-acb7-8c61abe3ad77.description: ONCU partners with Chapin Training & Security as they conduct a full day, hands-on certification training that includes CPR for adults and infants & Proper First Aid for adults and infants. J. Chapin, the owner of Chapin Training personally facilitates this training day for One Nevada Credit Union. Training also includes local Nevada emergency scenarios such as heat strokes and scorpion stings.
12d11382-7f88-4e79-acb7-8c61abe3ad77.name: Safety and First aid certification

issuer.summary: issued by One Nevada Credit Union

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners must be able to successfully perform proper CPR on both adult and infant CPR mannequins while under the supervision of the class instructor. In addition, badge earners will also need to adequately demonstrate proper first aid techniques.
Badge earners must also successfully complete a post-class written exam to receive their two-year CPR / First Aid certification.
